articles.title: Micron rallies, JetBlue & other airlines face weather disruptions
articles.mainIdea: Micron rallies, JetBlue & other airlines face weather disruptions
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: Micron rallies, JetBlue & other airlines face weather disruptions. Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi takes a look at some of Friday morning's trending tickers and stories. Nvidia (NVDA) is acquiring the assets of artificial intelligence (AI) chip startup Groq (GROQ.PVT) for $20 billion, Nvidia's biggest deal yet. Micron (MU) stock is extending its post-earnings rally, on track for a new record. Airline stocks, including Delta (DAL), United (UAL), JetBlue (JBLU), Southwest (LUV), and American (AAL), are in focus as severe winter weather threatens to disrupt holiday travel. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief. Related tickers mentioned: DAL, GROQ.PVT, JBLU, LUV, MU, NVDA, UAL.

articles.title: ASX Penny Stocks To Watch In December 2025
articles.mainIdea: ASX Penny Stocks To Watch In December 2025
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: ASX Penny Stocks To Watch In December 2025. As the Australian market approaches the end of 2025, it seems to be winding down for the holiday season with a slight dip, largely due to profit-taking and early closures. Despite this quiet period, investors continue to seek opportunities in niche areas like penny stocks, which remain relevant despite their somewhat outdated name. These stocks often represent smaller or newer companies that can offer significant growth potential when supported by strong financial foundations. Related tickers mentioned: AAL.AX, DSK.AX, EDU.AX, EZZ.AX, IGL.AX, JDO.AX, JDOPA.AX, MCHHF, MTO.AX, SSM.AX, SXE.AX, VRS.AX, WFRSF.
